select a.id a_id ,a.name a_name ,a.kana a_kana, a.email a_email, a.password a_password ,a.can_show_all_company a_canShowAllCompanies, ac.admins_id ac_adminsId ,ac.companies_id ac_companiesId ,c.id c_id ,c.name c_name ,c.kana c_kana ,c.remarks c_remarks from admins a left outer join admins_companies ac on ac.admins_id = a.id left outer join companies c on ac.companies_id = c.id where ac.admins_id = #{a.id} and ac.companies_id = #{c.id};
